/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the driver's seat of a car, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a hazy blue, suggesting either an early morning or late afternoon setting. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of depth to the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly green, blue, and gray, painting a picture of a city that is both vibrant and serene.
